concept.title: Help Command
concept.shortdesc: Use the help command to view additional information for the specified command.

conbody.p: command line interfacehelp commandFor additional information for each command, including the available arguments, use the help command as follows: $SDC_DIST/bin/streamsets cli \ (-U <sdcURL> | --url <sdcURL>) \ [(-a <sdcAuthType> | --auth-type <sdcAuthType>)] \ [(-u <sdcUser> | --user <sdcUser>)] \ [(-p <sdcPassword> | --password <sdcPassword>)] \ help <command>
For example, the following command displays the details for the manager command: $SDC_DIST/bin/streamsets cli -U http://localhost:18630 help manager
